title: suemi shimizu soler - functional and integrative nutrition
description: intestinal modulation, treatment of dysbiosis, irritable bowel syndrome, sifo, sibo, constipation, diarrhea, and weight loss.
initialMessageText: hi! i have visited your site and i would like to schedule a consultation as soon as possible
servicesMessageText: hi! i have visited your site and i would like to schedule a consultation as soon as possible. i am interested in the service
emailSubject: Hello! I would like to know more about your consultations!
emailBody: Hi Suemi!%0D%0A%0D%0AI have visited your site nutrisuemi.com and decided to email you to learn more about your services.%0D%0A%0D%0APlease get in touch with me as soon as possible to schedule a consultation.%0D%0A%0D%0ARegards!
aboutContent: functional Integrative Nutritionist with 13 years of experience, graduated in Nutrition in 2010 from the Regional University of Blumenau (FURB), with specialization courses in the field of Functional Nutrition and Intestinal Modulation and Microbiota.|the focus of my work is to DEFLAME and treat the CAUSE of your symptoms and help you achieve your maximum potential of physical and mental health through a realistic, delicious, and healthy diet.|i will assist you in identifying the root cause of your gastrointestinal problems so you can free yourself from bloating, gas, and intestinal discomfort. I am passionate about witnessing the power that Nutrition has in transforming people's lives and restoring their vitality and quality of life.

services.name: intestinal modulation
services.description1: intestinal modulation is essential for the proper functioning of our digestive system. by maintaining a healthy balance of bacteria in the intestine, we promote efficient digestion and proper absorption of nutrients. this intestinal harmony not only improves gastrointestinal health but also benefits other aspects of our well-being, including the immune system.
services.description2: by taking care of intestinal modulation, we can reduce the risk of digestive discomforts such as bloating and intestinal irregularities. additionally, a balanced intestinal microbiota has been associated with higher energy levels, improved mood, and even healthier skin. making healthy choices for our digestive system is an investment in the overall well-being of our body.

services.name: permanent weight loss
services.description1: losing weight permanently brings about a range of significant health benefits. beyond aesthetic improvements, sustainable weight loss is associated with a reduced risk of various chronic diseases, such as type 2 diabetes, heart disease, and hypertension. maintaining a healthy weight also contributes to optimal levels of cholesterol, blood pressure, and blood sugar, thereby promoting robust cardiovascular health.
services.description2: in addition to the physical benefits, permanent weight loss can have positive impacts on emotional and mental well-being. many individuals report increased self-esteem, confidence, and mood enhancements upon achieving and sustaining a healthy weight. furthermore, adopting balanced eating habits and engaging in regular physical activity throughout the weight loss journey fosters a healthy mindset toward the body, providing a lasting sense of accomplishment and happiness.
